- 지원되는_attrs, fh_expire_type, link_support, Symlink_support, Unique_handles, aclsupport, cansettime, Case_insensitive, Case_preserving, chown_restricted, files_avail, files_free, files_total, fs_locations, Homogeneous, maxfilesize, maxname, maxread, maxwrite, no_trunc, space_avail, space_free, space_total 및 time_delta
